extensionDescription.message: Interface modules for filtering content across FurAffinity

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for any search bar.

filtersPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when there are no filters to display.

usersPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when there are no users to display.

submissionsPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when there are no submissions to display.

confirmDiscard.message: Changes you made to $filter$ are unsaved. Save now?
confirmDiscard.description: Confirmation dialog text when a filter has changes but is not saved.

confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete $filter$? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDelete.description: Confirmation dialog text when the user clicks a delete button for a filter.

popupToggleApp.description: Title text for the popup power button.

popupNewFilter.description: Text for the popup filter button.

popupMasterList.description: Text for the popup master list button.

popupOptions.description: Text for the popup options button.

popupToggleFilter.description: Title text for toggle switches on the popup.

popupRemoveFilter.description: Title text for the delete button next to each filter on the popup.

editorNewText.description: Text on new filter button in the editor.

editorNewTitle.description: Title text for the new filter button in the editor.

editorSaveText.description: Text on save filter button in the editor.

editorSaveTitle.description: Title text for the save filter button in the editor.

editorCopyText.description: Text on copy filter button in the editor.

editorCopyTitle.message: Save a copy of the current filter
editorCopyTitle.description: Title text for the copy filter button in the editor.

editorLoadText.description: Text on load filter button in the editor.

editorLoadTitle.description: Title text for the load filter button in the editor.

editorDeleteText.description: Text on delete filter button in the editor.

editorDeleteTitle.message: Delete the current filter and clear the editor
editorDeleteTitle.description: Title text for the delete filter button in the editor.

editorImportText.description: Text on import filter button in the editor.

editorImportTitle.message: Import a filter from your computer
editorImportTitle.description: Title text for the import filter button in the editor.

editorExportText.description: Text on export filter button in the editor.

editorExportTitle.message: Export this filter to your computer
editorExportTitle.description: Title text for the export filter button in the editor.

editorSelectFilter.message: Select a filter from the dropdown:
editorSelectFilter.description: Text preceding the filter selection dropdown in the editor.

editorTitle.description: Title text of the filter editor main container.

editorUsersText.message: Artists, art collectors, and everyone else have their names listed here.

editorSubmissionsText.message: Each submission is identified by an ID number.

editorKeywordsText.message: These can help identify content on a document that can be filtered out.

editorPreferenceText.message: If a submission is matched, prefer filtering its creator instead:

editorOptionsText.message: Hide the following types of elements when users/submissions are blacklisted:

editorOptionAvatarTitle.message: This hides the profile pictures of users

editorOptionUsernameTitle.message: This hides instances of the user's name

editorOptionCommentTitle.message: This hides comments and shouts made by the user

editorOptionThumbnailTitle.message: This hides submission thumbnails, images, flashes, etc.

editorOptionTitleTitle.message: This hides submission titles, if they are found

editorOptionLinkTitle.message: This hides any other kind of link that goes to a submission

optionsTitle.description: Title for the extension options page.

optionsEnable.description: Text for the option to toggle the extension on or off.

optionsScan.message: Scan a webpage each time the tab is loaded or switched to
optionsScan.description: Text for the option to make webpage scanning happen more than once.

optionsSort.message: Automatically sort the contents of filters
optionsSort.description: Text for the option to auto-sort filter contents.

optionsCleanup.message: Cleanup profile pages to remove extra content
optionsCleanup.description: Text for the option to cleanup profile pages.

optionsNotifications.description: Text for the option to show browser notifications.

optionsReset.description: Text for the button that resets extension options.

optionsPurgeData.description: Text for the button that removes all app data.

listTitle.description: Title of the master list page.

listAddAll.description: Label for add-all dropdown used on master list and content pages.

listRemoveAll.description: Label for remove-all dropdown used on master list and content pages.

pageContentsTitle.description: Title of the page contents window.

pageShowWindowText.description: Text on the button that shows the page contents window.

pageShowWindowTitle.message: Display page contents in list form
pageShowWindowTitle.description: Title text for the button that shows the page contents window.

mainScanResults.description: Notification title text for the results of scanning a webpage.
